text: Vieru may refer to: *Igor Vieru (1923 – 1988), Moldovan painter *Anatol Vieru (1926 – 1998), Romanian composer *Grigore Vieru (1935 – 2009), Moldovan poet *Andrei Vieru (born 1958), pianist, writer and philosopher (son of Anatol) *Valerian Ciobanu-Vieru (born 1958), Moldovan writer *Ioan Vieru (poet) (born 1962) , a Romanian poet *Ioan Vieru (born 1979), Romanian sprinter *Natalia Vieru (born 1989), Moldavian-born Russian basketball player *Vieru, a village in Putineiu Commune, Giurgiu County, Romania Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Vieru
